text: Jennifer Aniston and Justin Theroux shocked the world when they announced their split in February 2018. After seven years as a couple and two and a half years of marriage, we thought they finally got their happy ending. Although they promised to “ [ continue ] their cherished friendship ” in the separation statement they released, we ’ re not so sure that ’ s the case anymore. Dark secrets have been revealed surrounding their divorce, including what they ’ re fighting over ( page 6 ) and why Theroux ’ s rumored relationship with Selena Gomez is so messed up ( page 8 ). 1.
